meanings.definition: Not filled with air or gas.
meanings.sent1: The uninflated balloon lay flat on the ground.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the uninflated tire on her bike and quickly pumped it up.
meanings.sent3: The uninflated beach ball looked sad among the fully inflated ones.
meanings.sent4: His uninflated ego finally burst when he faced criticism.
meanings.sent5: The uninflated life jacket offered no protection in the water.

meanings.sent1: Her uninflated claims were always backed up with evidence.
meanings.sent2: The news report provided an uninflated account of the situation.
meanings.sent3: His uninflated story about meeting a celebrity seemed too good to be true.
meanings.sent4: The uninflated price tag on the car was surprisingly low.
meanings.sent5: The uninflated praise from the critics was a refreshing change.
